SELECT question_seq.NEXTVAL qu_no FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO question(qu_no, writer, content, title, regdate) VALUES (#{qu_no}, #{writer}, #{content}, #{title}, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT q.qu_no, q.writer, q.content, q.title, to_char(q.regdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh:mi') as "REGDATE", u.v_email, u.v_name FROM userinfo u, question q WHERE q.writer = u.v_id ORDER BY q.qu_no DESC
